text: Pierre Lataillade (27 April 1933 â€“ 7 November 2020) was a French politician. He was born in Arcachon, France. He was a member of the Rally of the Republic Party. From 1978 to 1981, he was a member of the National Assembly. From 1985 to 2001, he was Mayor of Arcachon. From 1986 to 1999, he was a Member of the European Parliament. Lataillade died on 7 November 2020 in Gujan-Mestras, France at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:MEPs for France Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:People from Gironde
title: Pierre Lataillade
